function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"People staying home and consuming digital content","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to reduced social distancing and increased indoor activities","Mitigation":"Promote virtual/online interactions to reduce physical gatherings, enhance ventilation in indoor spaces, and encourage adherence to health guidelines","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, air purifiers for indoor spaces, and health monitoring apps","People":"General public, individuals staying at home","Owner":"Health authorities, building managers, and individuals"},{"Description":"Financial institutions offering educational classes in basic financial literacy","Impact":"Gathering of individuals for in-person education sessions may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Offer online education sessions, enforce social distancing and health guidelines for in-person sessions, and provide access to hygiene facilities","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, scheduling software for session management, and hygiene maintenance tools","People":"Students, educators, and staff attending the classes","Owner":"Financial institutions, educational content providers, and educational facilities"},{"Description":"Adaptation strategies for service organizations to cope with COVID-19","Impact":"Inadequate adaptation strategies may lead to increased risk of disease spread in service environments","Mitigation":"Implement remote service delivery, enforce strict hygiene and sanitization protocols, and provide protective equipment for frontline workers","Technologies":"Remote service platforms, contactless payment systems, and sanitation technologies","People":"Service providers, employees, and customers","Owner":"Service organizations, government agencies, and public health authorities"}]}
